= vim =

This page talked about some usage about vim.
* 一些常用指令
	- /find 之后按	n ---> to next	N ---> to former
	- :n,$s/str1/str2/g

* *conceal text*:
	- write a file named conceal.vim with the following:
		`sy match test_conceal "some_text_include_re" conceal`
		`cole=2`
	- open another file, type:
		`:so conceal.vim`
* *set rnu*
	- type:
		`:set rnu`
		`:set nornu`
		`:set nu`
		`:set nonu`
* *colorcolumn*
	- type:
		`:set cc=10,20,30`

* *map*
	- use `:help map` for whole help
	- add into .vimrc `let mapleader = ';'` to specify a mapleader, by default it is '\'
	- there are many types: *nmap*, *imap*, etc. See them in :help
	- some examples:
		`nmap <silent><leader>l :TlistToggle<cr>`
		`nmap <leader>j <C-W>w`
		`nmap <leader>q :q<cr>`
		`imap <F3> <C-^>`
